title: Pollution to Purpose
text: EcoValue Chain was founded by Team The Lorax, a Divisional Round Winner of the ImaGen Ventures Youth Challenge 2024-25. We are driven by a simple belief that waste can become wealthâ€”when innovation meets responsibility. Our work focuses on developing a low-cost, scalable fiber extraction process that converts water hyacinth into eco-friendly raw materials for handicrafts, packaging, and sustainable products.
